com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils

Class Colour

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Color
      • com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils.Colour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Paint, java.awt.Transparency, java.io.Serializable

    public class Colour
extends java.awt.Color
    A modified version of Color to support ANSI values.

    Created by Will on 11/24/14.

    Since:
    v3.1
    Author:
    Will "n9Mtq4" Bresnahan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getANSI

        public final java.lang.String getANSI()
        Turns this Colour into an ANSI code.
        Note: only works for some constants. (won't work with custom RGB).
        Returns:
        the ANSI string of the color for terminal colors.
        Since:
        v3.1
